articles.description: The Reds reached a new level of futility on the West Coast.
articles.content:
SAN DIEGO The Cincinnati Reds traditionally never play well on their West Coast road trips, but this was a different level of futility.
They went winless in their seven games in Southern California.… [+5509 chars]
